Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Mission Critical
b) Defect Observed: Wiring harness insulation breakdown. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Inadequate maintenance procedure resulting in improper installation
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Emergency Power component. Analysis
of operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Establish periodic calibration schedule
d) Attributable Code: R - Lapses on the part of Repair Agency/Manufacturer
Remarks: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate.
Date: 07/06/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel
